CustomField.description: This is the total cost for Founder Shield records. 9/23 - AB added policy fees untaxed to formula. 9/4/24 - AB added Underwriting Fees
CustomField.formula: Premium_Change_Amount__c + Wholesaler_Fees__c + Policy_Fees_Taxed__c + State_Fees_Other__c + State_Stamping_Fee__c + State_Tax__c + FS_Fee__c + State_Filing_Fee__c + Wholesale_Fees__c + Underwriting_Fees__c
CustomField.label: Total Cost
